      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.To get [ processorId and config_data ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Rules & MDM ):
          /account/permitted-processor-program-groups
          (**e.g.** data: 
          [ 
            \{ 
              "processorId": 439,
              "isSelected": 1, 
              "config_data":   
                [ "10730",
                  "10738" 
                ] 
            \} 
          ])
          
          **2.In data, we can add multiple processors seperated by comma**
          
          **3.Select [   program_id_type   ] as  "cip_programs" or "all_programs"**
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"account_number"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"67676767"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"card_number"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"123"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"expires_on"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"date"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","format":"date"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"program_id_type"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}

                </div>

              >

                schemaName={"string[]"}
